attributes.action: Make it mandatory for all shops to Challnge 21 on the sale of harmful goods act eg knives, blades etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is common practice for shops to challenge 21 but it is not law, i work in retail and things such as knives ( of any kind including plastic) are age restricted but i am allowed to sell a saw blade, razor blades, hammers etc to any age. we live in a society where stabbings and wounding are on the increase i would say this was the next logical step.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
